CustomField.formula: IF( OR(Team__c = "Org Strategy/Sales Hierarchy", Team__c = "Accounts, Leads, Contacts", Team__c = "Interfaces/ETL", Team__c = "Approvals/IWA", Team__c = "Mobile", Team__c = "Security", Team__c = "Data Migration" ), "Unanimous", IF( OR(Team__c = "Sales Process", Team__c = "Doc Strategy", Team__c = "LoA", Team__c = "Forecasting", Team__c = "Reporting" ), "Majority", "") )
CustomField.label: Approval Required
